monsters.name: Ser Elian

traits.desc: Ser Elian has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
traits.name: Brave Spirit

traits.desc: Ser Elian often utters half-remembered heroic lines during battle, inspiring allies. Once per short rest, he can grant an ally within 30 feet a d4 inspiration die as a bonus action.
traits.name: Inspiring Words

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.
actions.name: Longsword (Two-Handed)

monsters.equipment: Plate armor, longsword, shield with family crest

traits.name: Aura of Protection
traits.desc: Allies within 10 ft. gain a bonus to all saving throws equal to his Charisma modifier (+4).

traits.name: Aura of Courage
traits.desc: Allies within 10 ft. cannot be frightened while Aldric is conscious.

traits.name: Divine Smite
traits.desc: When Aldric hits with a melee weapon attack, he may expend a spell slot to deal radiant damage: +2d8 (1st-level slot), +1d8 per level above 1st. +1d8 more vs undead or fiends.

traits.name: Unyielding Will
traits.desc: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, or possessed.

traits.name: Second Wind (1/Short Rest)
traits.desc: Regain 1d10 + 20 HP as a bonus action.

traits.name: Action Surge (1/Short Rest)
traits.desc: Take one additional action on his turn.

traits.name: Riposte (Battlemaster Maneuver)
traits.desc: When a creature misses him with a melee attack, can use a reaction to make a melee attack and add 1d12 extra damage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Aldric fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Greatsword of Judgement (Carsomyr)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 5 slashing + 3 radiant. May expend spell slot to smite. Target loses magical benefits (Dispel Magic effect) on hit once per turn (DC 17).

actions.name: Lay on Hands (100 HP/day)
actions.desc: As an action, Aldric can restore up to 100 HP per day, or cure disease/poison (5 HP per condition).

actions.name: Smite the Unholy (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Each creature of fiend or undead type within 15 ft. must succeed on a DC 17 Con save or take 6d10 radiant damage and be blinded until end of Aldric’s next turn. Half on save.

bonus_actions.name: Great Weapon Master Strike
bonus_actions.desc: Before making an attack, Aldric may choose to take a –5 penalty to hit. If he hits, he adds +10 to the damage.

bonus_actions.name: Bonus Attack (GWM)
bonus_actions.desc: If he scores a critical hit or reduces a target to 0 HP, he may make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

reactions.name: Riposte
reactions.desc: When a creature misses with a melee attack, Aldric makes a melee weapon attack and adds 1d12 extra damage.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: Aldric moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Smite Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Aldric makes a melee attack with his Greatsword of Judgement. If it hits, he smites with a 2nd-level spell slot.

legendary_actions.name: Dispel Wave (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Aldric casts *Dispel Magic* at 3rd level, targeting a creature he can see within 30 ft.

traits.name: Unstable Magic
traits.desc: Whenever Elira casts a sorcerer spell of 1st level or higher, roll a d20. On a 1, roll on the Wild Magic Surge table.

traits.name: Awakened Amulet
traits.desc: Elira's amulet emits soft magical radiation. While she wears it, she has advantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration, and her hair and eyes glow faintly when she casts spells.

traits.name: Sorcerous Origin: Wild Magic
traits.desc: Elira is a Wild Magic Sorcerer, although she is only just discovering what that means.

actions.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 fire damage.

actions.name: Shield (1st-level Spell)
actions.desc: As a reaction when hit, Elira casts *Shield*, raising her AC by +5 until the start of her next turn.

actions.name: Chaos Bolt (1st-level Spell)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit. Hit: 2d8 + 1d6 damage. The type of damage is determined randomly.

bonus_actions.name: Sorcery Points (1/day)
bonus_actions.desc: Regains 1 sorcery point once per day, which can be used to trigger subtle or quicken spell (DM's discretion).

monsters.name: Selaveth, The Mother
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc:

**4th level (3 slots):** <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>03%20-%20Player%20Log%20&%20Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/spells/greater-invisibility.md|greater invisibility<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>03%20-%20Player%20Log%20&%20Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/spells/blight.md|blight<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>

traits.name: Arcane Rejuvenation
traits.desc: Once per short rest, when she drops a creature to 0 HP with a spell, Selaveth regains one expended spell slot of 3rd level or lower.

traits.name: Dreamcatcher Amulet
traits.desc: Her amulet can store one spell of up to 3rd level, which she can cast without expending a spell slot. She may change the stored spell during a long rest.

actions.name: Eldritch Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) force damage. She fires two beams.

actions.name: Shadowbind (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Selaveth targets up to three creatures within 60 ft. They must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be restrained by shadowy tendrils for 1 minute. They may repeat the save at the end of each of their turns.

traits.name: Master of Intrigue
traits.desc: Jack can mimic speech, writing, and behavior after observing for 1 minute. He can unerringly adopt disguises, imitating mannerisms to fool most.

traits.name: Master of Tactics
traits.desc: Jack can use the Help action as a bonus action, and do so from 30 ft. away if his ally can see or hear him.

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.desc: He can Dash, Disengage, or Hide as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (4d6)
traits.desc: Once per turn, Jack deals 14 (4d6) extra damage when he has advantage on the attack roll or when an ally is within 5 ft. of the target.

traits.name: Silver-Tongued Devil
traits.desc: Jack has advantage on Persuasion and Deception checks made in front of an audience or crowd.

traits.name: Flair for the Dramatic
traits.desc: Whenever Jack rolls initiative, he may draw a card and dramatically toss it into the air. He gains advantage on his first attack roll of that combat.

actions.name: Twin Revolvers
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 60/150 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6+4) piercing damage. Jack makes two attacks.

actions.name: Disarming Flourish
actions.desc: Jack targets one creature within 30 ft. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or drop one held item of Jack’s choice.

actions.name: Distracting Gambit (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Jack theatrically flips cards, twirls pistols, or spins into the spotlight. Each enemy within 20 ft. that can see him must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be distracted, granting advantage to Jack’s allies against them until the start of his next turn.

monsters.name: Avatar of Zariel
monsters.damage_resistances: cold; fire; radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Weakened Manifestation
traits.desc: This avatar represents only a fraction of Zariel’s true power. Her hit points, AC, and saving throw DCs are reduced compared to her true form.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
traits.desc: If the Avatar fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Hellfire Aura
traits.desc: At the start of each of the Avatar’s turns, each creature within 10 feet takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The Avatar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Avatar makes two attacks with Hellfire Blade or one Hellfire Blade and one Infernal Grasp.

actions.name: Hellfire Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8+6) slashing damage plus 21 (6d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Infernal Grasp (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On a hit, the target takes 27 (6d8) necrotic damage and must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution save or be <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/rules/conditions.md#Blinded|blinded<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK> until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Wings of Cinders (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The Avatar beats her burning wings. Each creature of her choice within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 26 (6d8) fire damage and be knocked prone.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The Avatar makes one Hellfire Blade attack.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: The Avatar magically teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

legendary_actions.name: Burning Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The Avatar targets one creature it can see within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or take 18 (4d8) fire damage and become <STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK>03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/rules/conditions.md#Frightened|frightened<STATBLOCK-MARKDOWN-LINK> until the end of its next turn.

lair_actions.desc:
- Flames of Avernus: Fire erupts in a 20-ft radius at a point the Avatar can see within 120 ft. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (4d6) fire damage.  
- Hellish Chains: Fiery chains erupt from the ground in a 15-ft square. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be restrained until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc:

traits.name: Artifact Conduit
traits.desc: While attuned to the Artifact of Kelemvor, Malen can channel destructive power. When concentrating on a spell, he can also unleash a pulse of necrotic energy: each enemy within 20 ft. takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.desc: If Malen fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Mace of Judgment
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8+5) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Channel Divinity (2/Day)
actions.desc:
Malen can use one of the following options:  
- **Turn Undead.** Undead within 30 ft. must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom save or be turned.  
- **Path to the Grave.** As a bonus action, Malen curses one creature within 30 ft. The next time one of Malen’s allies hits that creature, the target becomes vulnerable to all of that attack’s damage.

bonus_actions.name: Spiritual Weapon
bonus_actions.desc: Malen summons a spectral scythe (2d8+5 force damage, +11 to hit, range 60 ft.).

reactions.name: Kelemvor’s Judgment
reactions.desc: When Malen or an ally within 30 ft. would be reduced to 0 hp, Malen can instead have them drop to 1 hp (1/long rest).

legendary_actions.name: Grave Pulse (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Malen forces one creature he can see within 30 ft. to make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or take 18 (4d8) necrotic damage and gain disadvantage on saving throws until the start of its next turn.
